segments.text: Hey , I still know my name .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She said I have a fever but nothing major .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In that case , you should go home and get plenty of rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What if this small fever turns into a big fever ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then I'll phone our family physician and make an appointment for you .
segments.speaker: S1
